This package was created to help a user deal with datasets. 

The my_csv_reader and save_as_csv functions help the user open, read and save csv files. 

The multi_excel function help the user read and separate excel sheets from and excel file. 

The draw_a_name and draw_names function gives an opportunity for the user to analyze the popularity of different names from 1970 to today.
